title: The Solar System - Jason Lisle
description:
This work explores aspects of the solar system, including our own Earth, and highlights the diversity and wonders of God's creation. Through them we will see that truly "the firmament shows His handiwork" (Psalm 19:1).

About the author:
As Director of Research, Dr. Lisle leads ICR's gifted team of scientists who continue to investigate and demonstrate evidence for creation. He graduated summa cum laude from Ohio Wesleyan University where he double-majored in physics and astronomy and minored in mathematics. He earned a master's degree and a Ph.D. in astrophysics at the University of Colorado
